net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.valuation
Class ReturnForecastValuationPolicy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.valuation.AbstractValuationPolicy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.valuation.ReturnForecastValuationPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventSubscriber, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, ValuationPolicy, MarketEventListener
public class ReturnForecastValuationPolicy
extends AbstractValuationPolicy
implements java.lang.Cloneable

A valuation policy which decides the valuation by making a forecast of the next period return.

See Also:
